HomePage.resume: Experienced and passionate Front-End Developer specializing in building scalable and efficient digital solutions. I use Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS to create responsive and accessible user interfaces. I'm a collaborative and detail-oriented engineer, committed to delivering well-structured and high-performance cross-platform applications.

AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description: A brief introduction to who I am.

resume.paragraf_1: Hello there! Thank you for visiting my personal website. I'm Nelsen Chandra, a Visual Communication Design major at SMKS Ketintang Surabaya. I'm a Front-End Developer and Graphic Designer with a passion for building impactful software products. My tech stack includes modern Front-End technologies like Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
resume.paragraf_2: I enjoy creating user-friendly and high-performance solutions. I excel at building intuitive interfaces. I strive to bring efficiency and clarity to every layer of an application. I'm a fast learner who thrives in dynamic environments and enjoys solving complex problems both collaboratively and individually.
resume.paragraf_3: I believe that strong communication and teamwork are key to success in software development. My experiences have shaped my technical and analytical skills, as well as my leadership qualities. I'm always eager to work in teams, learn from others, and contribute to impactful projects.
